name: Strength Runner
description:
Strength Runner was created for GDL game jam in 3 days (started 2021-07-01).

It is an endless runner where you lose and gain strength depending on enemies, time, and power-ups as the table below:

LOSEGAIN
Over time (each frame)
Power-ups
Colliding with enemies stronger than you
Colliding with enemies weaker than you

If you lose all your strength, you die

the score is shown on top-center(while playing) and on top-left(after die)

You should keep the most strength that you can and avoid stronger enemies by jumping

If you play a native version, you can jump using controllers:  X (playstation) or A (xbox)

I hope you enjoy
